TopicTitle: Guide to all .23 Easter Egg locations

Articles.Content:
After doing a lot of research on Easter eggs, I failed to find a lot of comprehensive information on all of the Easter eggs in one place. Threads tended to have pictures and images of the Easter eggs themselves, but not necessarily the locations and surrounding areas. My brother and I worked together to make an exhaustive guide, and after many (many) hours of searching, I present to the KSP community an exhaustive guide to all locatable Easter eggs in .23. Also, if you find any major mistakes, such as missing an Easter egg, please let me know in an in-forum PM as I was primarily responsible for locating these and I could do a followup video. Almost all information needed to find them is in the video, and I'll probably work on a tips and tricks video on my spring break.

Feedback would be awesome.

I'm kind of new to here so if I've posted in the wrong forum please relocate it.

Very usefull! I've been looking for one of these for a long time!

Welcome to the forums, by the way!

The Tylo Cave is there but underground. I did this a couple of months ago.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-(Done!)-Pic-Heavy

But he found the Monolith in the Mountainrange west of KSC which I couldnt find.

I think this might belong in the "Live from Mission Control" subforum, but is in the right forum.

EDIT: Didn't' realize this was in the Tutorials section. Yah, it belongs in the "Live from Mission Control" subforum in the Fanworks forum.
Really nice tour of the system and much more than just easter eggs. Thanks for the vid!

@ MalfunctionM1Ke

Tylo cave system is at 42:05, but it's hard to see underground.

Glad I could help you find that one monolith.
WOW this was great thank you so much for the time and effort you put into this video!!

Transcript/written-form and still images please :-)

Sounds like you put a huge amount of work into this but a 45-minute video would kill my broadband cap.

Written-form is also easier to scan through to find a specific item

Yeah thats pretty cool! But I want to give a tip, if you want to see the LOL face you can also use the SCANsat mod and before I watched this video I actually never knew it was an easter egg I thought that it was just a glitch.
